masters.title: Masters
masters.expert_vs_top_desktop_HTML: What is the difference between Top Barber and Expert?
masters.expert_vs_top_01: In our barbershop there are two categories of masters: Expert and Top Barber.
masters.expert_vs_top_02: Experts are experienced craftsmen with many years of experience and a large client base, offering a high level of services.
masters.expert_vs_top_03: Top Barbers are the same professionals in their field as experts, but due to less experience, they have a smaller client base, and therefore, due to affordable prices, we help the master find his client, and the client his master.
masters.expert_vs_top_04: And remember - no matter who you sign up with, you will always receive service and results at the highest level!

about.title: About us
about.text_01_HTML: Welcome to Rowdy Barbershop - your faithful companion on the path to the perfect look! Our barbershop is not just a place for a haircut, it is a real temple of male beauty and style in the very heart of Zaporozhye.
about.text_02_HTML: Our experienced barbers are masters of men's haircuts, bearded design and professional shaving. They are always ready to turn any of your ideas into reality and give your image a unique charm.
about.text_03_HTML: You can also enjoy a gray hair coloring service that will make you look younger and more stylish. And the look will be completed with the perfect hair styling, which will highlight your individuality and style.
about.text_04_HTML: Rowdy Barbershop is not just a men's hair salon, it is a place where every man can feel stylish and confident. We invite you to visit us and see for yourself!

01.question: Do I need to make an appointment?
01.answer: We recommend making an appointment in advance for your convenience. You can do this online on the website or by phone. You can also come without an appointment, but in this case we cannot guarantee that a free barber will be available at the time of your visit.

02.question: What is the difference between a Top Barber and an Expert?
02.answer: A Top Barber is a high-level professional, ideal for classic and modern haircuts. An Expert is a barber with a higher level of experience and skills. He can handle any task, including complex haircuts and creative looks.

03.question: How long does a standard haircut last?

04.question: What is the difference between a "Men's haircut" and a "Scissor haircut"?
04.answer: A men's haircut involves the use of clippers, scissors and/or a trimmer. A scissor haircut is done exclusively with scissors, without clippers. It is ideal for long or medium-long hair.

05.question: Why do we cut children aged 8 and up?
05.answer: We work with children aged 8 and up because at this age, a child can already sit quietly during a haircut, understand the hairdresser's instructions and participate in the discussion of the desired result. This allows us to ensure comfort and quality of service for both the child and the hairdresser.

06.question: Do we provide gift certificates?
06.answer: Yes, we have gift certificates for any barbershop services. This is a great gift for friends and family! You can buy a certificate from the administrator at the barbershop.

07.question: What payment methods do we accept?
07.answer: We accept both cash and bank cards. Choose the method that is most convenient for you!
